validation.output: RouteListView.swift modified with alphabetical sections and iOS 26+ section index APIs. Optimized to compute sections once. Handles numeric routes with '#' section. Includes iOS <26 fallback.

next_checkpoint_context: RouteListView now groups routes alphabetically within each filtered modality. A-Z section index on right edge (iOS 26+). Section headers display single letters (A, B, T, etc). Numeric routes grouped under '#'. Graceful degradation on iOS <26 (sections visible, no index).
